description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. In order to save her mother, sexy Kim Brooks must fight off hordes of bad-ass aliens in a televised event known as Annihilator. So put on your space boots and shoot aliens in the face!
